"To make sure you know exactly who's calling you next time, add %1$s to your contact book."
Control who gets to your phone - whether they’re in your contacts or not!
Block or send any number to voicemail
"Caller ID reduces unidentified calls by displaying a caller's information, even if they're not in your contact list."
"Activate Caller ID so you can know who's calling before you answer."
Not sure who that number belongs to? We’ll do a reverse phone number lookup and show you anything we can about who is calling.
Perform a reverse phone number lookup
Tired of telemarketers? Or survey calls? We’ll identify and block call types you don’t want to see anymore!
Send different types of calls to voicemail
Decide whether you want to always get calls, send calls to voicemail, or block calls from specific numbers and easily report them if something isn’t right.

"Change your phone number—for any reason—up to one time a year at no additional cost.
Find out more in: Settings > Scam Shield features"
When You Need a Clean Slate

"Use your PROXY number when you don't want to share your private phone number. Calls, voicemails, and texts are accessible any time in the DIGITS app.
Qualifying service required.
Find out more in: Settings > Scam Shield features"
Help identify suspicious callers or fraudsters and prevent their calls from being received by you—or others—in the future.
Once you activate Scam Block, our network will automatically block calls from likely scammers, keeping them off your phone entirely. You can enable this feature in the Scam Block section of the app.
Scam ID and Scam Block identify and help stop likely scammers before you ever get the call.
Our powerful network analyzes every call using A.I., machine learning, and patented technologies. And our defenses update every six minutes to stay ahead of scammers.

Now that Sprint and T-Mobile have merged, our network is bigger and better than ever, with advanced scam-blocking protection built into its core. So every customer can be better-protected—at no extra charge.
"With the Scam Shield app, you get the ultimate control over T-Mobile's anti-scam protections, like:"

"We've added Voicemail to Text* to your free 30-day trial of Scam Shield Premium. Now, your voicemails will automatically be transcribed and texted to you so you can quickly decide if a call is urgent or not.
We've also reset your trial clock, so you may experience all premium features for 30 days, starting now."
Your FREE 30-day trial just got even better!
Apptentive is a feedback and communication service which allows the people who make this app to quickly get your feedback and better listen to you.
"Your feedback is hosted by Apptentive and is subject to Apptentive's privacy policy and the privacy policy of the developer of this app."
Please connect to the internet to send feedback.
"It looks like we're having trouble accessing feedback. Please wait a bit and try again."

Welcome to your ultimate call control center
Sample image of Scam Shield Activity
Introducing Scam Shield Fewer scam calls. Period.
No cellular data connection. Please check your network settings.
Insufficient storage; please free up some space and try again.
"We weren't able to connect to the network"
Please check that the device is connected to Wi-Fi or cellular data is on.
"We're having some trouble submitting your report to the network."

By opting in, you’ll get a free 30-day trial of all Scam Shield features, including unlimited call and call category management. You can block any number, send any number directly to voicemail, and create a list of always allowed numbers. You’ll also be able to manage calls by type, sending unwanted call types (telemarketing, surveys, political appeals, and more) right to voicemail.
Now you can block text and picture messages with Scam Shield. Just add any number to your message block list.
"By using Scam Shield, you agree to the "Scam Shield Terms & Conditions
By continuing you agree to our End User License Agreement. Link to end users license agreement
No cellular data connection. Please check your network settings.
Without the phone permissions Scam Shield will be unable to authenticate you and access to Scam Shield will be denied. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
Scam Shield requires phone permissions to authenticate and open. Please go to your device settings/apps/Scam Shield permissions to enable phone permissions and re-open the app.
"Network based call blocking Call category management Approved caller list Call category identification Advanced notification management"

"Thanks for updating! The Scam Shield app lets you easily manage your anti-scam features, so you can continue to identify, block, and report likely scam calls.
And everything is still saved on our network, so your settings will stay, even if you remove the app or get a new phone."

"The Scam Shield app lets you easily manage your anti-scam features, so you can identify, block, and report likely scam calls, plus label numbers as Favorites.
And everything is saved on our network, so your settings will stay, even if you remove the app or get a new phone."
Sorry, there have been too many incorrect attempts to enter the billing PIN. Your account has been temporarily locked. To add this feature please call 611.
Your trial subscription will include caller ID, personal number blocking, category ID, category management, and reverse number lookup.
Please call 1-800-937-8997 so we can help sort this out.

"While your upgrade takes place, some premium features may not be available. You will receive a notification when all features are available.
If this lasts more than 5 minutes, restart the app and try again!"
Your Scam Shield subscription is being processed. Number lookup will be available momentarily when your Scam Shield subscription has been finalized. We will notify you once this feature is available.
Your Scam Shield trial is being processed. Number lookup will be available momentarily when your Scam Shield trial has been finalized. We will notify you once this feature is available.
Numbers or contacts marked as a favorite will always be allowed through our network.
Numbers and contacts on this list will be blocked as soon as they hit our network and you will only be able to see their calls in your Activity log.
Never get an unwanted call again.
We were unable to update your preference. Please try again later.
Our network will block calls from the numbers you’ve added to this list.
Our network will always allow calls from the numbers you’ve added to this list.
Our network will send calls from the numbers you’ve added to this list to voicemail.
This feature is supported for numbers with a minimum of 10 digits.

Contact a mobile expert or visit a store to change your number."

T-Mobile Scam Shield powered by First Orion

"Scam Shield gives you an extra PROXY number that you can use when you don’t want to share your private phone number.
It works like a free spam folder and is delivered through our DIGITS app, where you can check your PROXY voicemails and messages. You can get one free PROXY number per account on any postpaid voice plan (up to 12 lines).
Contact a mobile expert or visit a store to activate your PROXY number."

Qualifying service & capable device required. 1 per account; may be cancelled for non-use. DIGITS supports 911 but use a regular phone number/connection when possible; always give 911 operator your location & callback number; callback may be answered by shared users. See DIGITS Terms of Use for additional 911 information.

Search usage notes:" Now RealmBrowser doesn't support searching through "byte[], Date, RealmObject and RealmList" field types.
To search through other field types use the following request format: "fieldName:value". Search over "String type fields uses contains() function (search is case sensitive), for other types function equals()" is used. "
Value %s can not be parsed as %s
Please select the option that best describes your report:

Scam Shield may send report information to government agencies such as the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) where it may be used for statistical reporting and law enforcement purposes in an effort to protect consumers from unlawful calling practices.
Please answer the following questions to complete your report.
What type of call was this?
Called me at work after told not to
Did not disclose it was a sales call
I do not owe the debt
I do NOT owe this debt
I have done business with the caller
Called on my mobile after told not to
I have received more than 25 calls
I previously told caller to stop calling
They were calling for someone else
Threatened to sue or garnish my wages
Told my family or friends about my debt
I have told them to stop calling
Continues calling after being told to stop
Said I won lottery or prize
Please select the option that best describes your report:
"Please tell us more about your report. Share as many details as possible."
Thank you for submitting your report!

"Based on the information you provided, we encourage you take steps to protect your personal information.
Scam Shield has partnered with Identity Theft Resource Center to provide free information and counseling on how to protect your identity.
If you think your identity has been compromised, please call (888) 400-5530."
